args.query: If f is continuous on (a,b) and differentiable on (a,b) \{c\} and f' tends to L at c then f differentiable at c and f'(c)=L

result:
{"ok": true, "results": [{"id": 453437, "informal_statement": "Assume that $f,g:[0,1]\rightarrow[0,1] $ are two continuos functions so that $\forall x \in [0,1] \Rightarrow f(g(x))=g(f(x))$. Prove that $\exists x_{0} \in [0,1] ; f(x_{0})=g(x_{0})$.", "formal_statement": "import Mathlib
open BigOperators
open Real Nat Topology

theorem extract_aug_453437 (f g : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù) (hf: Continuous f) (hg: Continuous g) (h : ‚àÄ x ‚àà Set.Icc 0 1, f (g x) = g (f x)) : ‚àÉ x ‚àà Set.Icc 0 1, f x = g x  :=  by

args.natural_language_statement: Let f : (a,b) ‚Üí ‚Ñù be continuous on (a,b) and differentiable on (a,b) \ {c} for some c ‚àà (a,b). Assume lim_{x‚Üíc} f'(x) = L exists. Prove that f is differentiable at c and f'(c) = L. Formalize in Lean 4 (import Mathlib), end statement with := by sorry.

result:
{"ok": true, "lean_translation": "import Mathlib
open Lean Meta
open Elab
open Tactic
open Qq
open Mathlib.Tactic.TryThis
open Lean.Meta.Rewrites
open Elab.Tactic.Tactic

/-- Attempt to prove the goal using rewrite search, with a less aggressive tactic execution
strategy. -/
def runRewriteSearch (goal : MVarId) : MetaM MVarId := sorry"}

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Let f : (a,b) ‚Üí ‚Ñù be continuous on (a,b) and differentiable on (a,b) \ {c} for some c ‚àà (a,b).
    Assume lim_{x‚Üíc} f'(x) = L exists. Then f is differentiable at c and f'(c) = L. -/
theorem differentiable_at_of_deriv_tendsto {a b c L : ‚Ñù} {f : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù}
  (hc : a < c ‚àß c < b)
  (hcont : ContinuousOn f (Ioo a b))
  (hdiff : DifferentiableOn ‚Ñù f ((Ioo a b) \ {c}))
  (hderiv_lim : Tendsto (fun x => deriv f x) (nhdsWithin c ((Ioo a b) \ {c})) (ùìù L)) :
  DifferentiableAt ‚Ñù f c ‚àß deriv f c = L := by sorry

import Mathlib

theorem differentiable_at_of_deriv_tendsto {a b c L : ‚Ñù} {f : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù}
  (hpos : a < c ‚àß c < b)
  (hcont : ContinuousOn f (Ioo a b))
  (hdiff : DifferentiableOn ‚Ñù f (Ioo a b \ {c}))
  (hderiv_lim : Tendsto (fun x => derivWithin f (Ioo a b \ {c}) x) (nhdsWithin c (Ioo a b \ {c})) (ùìù L)) :
  DifferentiableAt ‚Ñù f c ‚àß deriv f c = L := by sorry

import Mathlib

theorem differentiable_at_of_deriv_tendsto {a b c L : ‚Ñù} {f : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù}
  (hpos : a < c ‚àß c < b)
  (hcont : ContinuousOn f (Ioo a b))
  (hdiff : DifferentiableOn ‚Ñù f (Ioo a b \ {c}))
  (hderiv_lim : Tendsto (fun x => derivWithin f (Ioo a b \ {c}) x) (nhdsWithin c (Ioo a b \ {c})) (ùìù L)) :
  DifferentiableAt ‚Ñù f c ‚àß deriv f c = L := by sorry

theorem differentiable_at_of_deriv_tendsto {a b c L : ‚Ñù} {f : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù}
  (hpos : a < c ‚àß c < b)

  (hderiv_lim : Tendsto (fun x => derivWithin f (Ioo a b \ {c}) x) (nhdsWithin c (Ioo a b \ {c})) (ùìù L)) :
  DifferentiableAt ‚Ñù f c ‚àß deriv f c = L := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Let f : (a,b) ‚Üí ‚Ñù be continuous on (a,b) and differentiable on (a,b) \ {c} for some c ‚àà (a,b).
    Assume lim_{x‚Üíc} f'(x) = L exists. Then f is differentiable at c and f'(c) = L. -/
theorem differentiable_at_of_deriv_tendsto {a b c L : ‚Ñù} {f : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù}
  (hpos : a < c ‚àß c < b)
  (hcont : ContinuousOn f (Ioo a b))
  (hdiff : DifferentiableOn ‚Ñù f (Ioo a b \ {c}))
  (hderiv_lim : Tendsto (fun x => derivWithin f (Ioo a b \ {c}) x) (nhdsWithin c (Ioo a b \ {c})) (ùìù L)) :
  DifferentiableAt ‚Ñù f c ‚àß deriv f c = L := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-- Let f : (a,b) ‚Üí ‚Ñù be continuous on (a,b) and differentiable on (a,b) \ {c} for some c ‚àà (a,b).
    Assume lim_{x‚Üíc} f'(x) = L exists. Then f is differentiable at c and f'(c) = L. -/
theorem differentiable_at_of_deriv_tendsto {a b c L : ‚Ñù} {f : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù}
  (hpos : a < c ‚àß c < b)
  (hcont : ContinuousOn f (Set.Ioo a b))
  (hdiff : DifferentiableOn ‚Ñù f (Set.Ioo a b \ {c}))
  (hderiv_lim : Tendsto (fun x => derivWithin f (Set.Ioo a b \ {c}) x) (nhdsWithin c (Set.Ioo a b \ {c})) (nhds L)) :
  DifferentiableAt ‚Ñù f c ‚àß deriv f c = L := by sorry
